title: Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth) Order 2024.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers (Leader,
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers (Leader, 
Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (leader minister child equality disability integration youth) order 2024

title: Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth) Order 2024.
heading: 2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose
text_raw:
2. Each person mentioned in the Schedule, particulars of each of whose 
address have been deposited at the offices of the Department of the Taoiseach, 
is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister of the Government who is 
the leader of a political party registered in the Register of Political Parties and 
Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth with effect 
from 8 July 2024. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th October, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [506] 3
